title: What does scientometry tell us about mercury toxicology and its biological impairments?
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Daiane Claydes Baia-da-Silva, Paulo Fernando Santos Mendes, Diane Cleydes Baia da Silva, Victória Santos Chemelo, Leonardo Oliveira Bittencourt, Pedro Magalhães Padilha, Reinaldo Barreto Oriá, Michael Aschner, Rafael Rodrigues Lima
